sentences.english: Play is turn-based, with Red starting.
sentences.chinese: 遊戲是回合制，以紅色開始。

sentences.english: First of all, Fantasy Westward Journey is a turn-based role-playing game.

sentences.english: The Battle for Wesnoth is a free, turn-based strategy game with a fantasy theme.
